name: You can apply for a final order (respondent)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your ((partner)) has still not applied for a final order. This means your ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)) is still not legally ended. 

If they will not or cannot apply then you can apply instead, even though you are the respondent. This is because it has been over three months since they could apply. If you want to apply then sign in to your account and find out how: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Important update: your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
